Detailed Description

template<typename Var>
struct WatchNotLiteralConstraint< Var >

constraints;w-notliteral Description The constraint w-notliteral(x, a) ensures that x =/= a. constraints;w-notliteral References See also

help constraints w-literal

template<typename Var>
int WatchNotLiteralConstraint< Var >::dynamic_trigger_count (  )  [inline, virtual]

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

This function can be called during search if the function is reified

Definition at line 62 of file dynamic_notliteral.h.

template<typename Var>
virtual bool WatchNotLiteralConstraint< Var >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
